channel.title: Noel on Jeremy Roschelle
channel.description: Recent content in Noel on Jeremy Roschelle

item.title: Time Jumpers, Nashville
item.description: Monday night in Nashville. What to do? We chose The Time Jumpers, a band that’s been together for 24 years. With three fiddles, a pedal steel guitar, at least a half dozen singers, and more, we couldn’t go wrong. The music was a mix of country-western songs with lots of spirited improvisations, as Monday night is the night for the musicians to have fun. The night’s featured singer, Wendy, had been on The Voice and was wonderful. I also was amazed by the pedal steel player who produced tasty licks and precision high speed runs all night long.
